item.description:
We can go up the Centennial trail (I think) to another on the south side of the mountain. It should take an hour or so to get to the top, and another hour to return.

When we get back down we can go to "The Mountain Barn" down Rt 31 from Princeton Ctr about 2 miles, for food and beverage.

We can carpool from Worcester (Price Chopper on W. Mtn St.) at about 12:30 if anyone is interested. Let me know.

Email me if you need any more info. Look forward to seeing you there!
item.how_to_find_us: We can meet at the ranger station at 1 PM. I have a blue Hyundai Santa Fe.
item.why: Sunshine, fresh air, great views before the leaves all come out on the trees.
item.name: Hiking Mt. Wachusett /
